What if I were to tell you that shoppers are more likely to buy jam from a seller that sells 6 or less variations? With an overwhelming amount of choice, more of us end up suffering from decision fatigue. Less is more!#RetailTip #WeShareThisSpace pic.twitter.com/M4Cc7wNZD0

Over 90% of communication between individuals in nonverbal! This is important in retail sales when your job depends on successful interactions with customers. Keep this in mind when dealing with customers & make a note of your body language!#RetailTip #WeShareThisSpace pic.twitter.com/4uix0XVKUx
